chunks.text:
Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:36:48
Folder: C1D28R6 - etihad aviation case
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1D28R6_00
From: Mohammed El Neel <Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com>
To: Samar El Mallou <Samar.Elmallou@chalhoub.com>; Hamid Ahmadi <Hamid.Ahmadi@chalhoub.com>; Dee Deu <dee.deu@chalhoub.com>
CC: Leena Azhikkal <Leena.Azhikkal@chalhoub.com>; Nabil Chalhoub <Nabil.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>; Nasser Alblooshi <Nasser.Alblooshi@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-04-17 10:38
Subject: RE: Etihad Aviation case 
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Samar,

Will review and get back to you in mean time will prepare the necessary requirement to report the incident to the Police.

 

@Hamid Ahmadi <mailto:Hamid.Ahmadi@chalhoub.com>  and @Dee Deu <mailto:dee.deu@chalhoub.com>  for investigation and comments.

 

 

From: Samar El Mallou <Samar.Elmallou@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Wednesday, 16 April 2025 2:39 PM
To: Mohammed El Neel <Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Leena Azhikkal <Leena.Azhikkal@chalhoub.com>; Nabil Chalhoub <Nabil.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>; Nasser Alblooshi <Nasser.Alblooshi@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Etihad Aviation case 

 

Dear Mohammed,

 

Further to Etihad situation brief to you today, please attached for your reference the correspondence and documents exchanged and received from and to the party/ ETIHAD AVIATION GROUP/ .

Dear Mohammed,

 

Further to Etihad situation brief to you today, please attached for your reference the correspondence and documents exchanged and received from and to the party/ ETIHAD AVIATION GROUP/ .

*	Attachments  1 to 4 received from the party / Etihad aviation /, sent from PC office to action.
*	Attachment 5 receiving Etihad invoice and declaration form EOI.
*	Attachment 6 proof of payment value 54,820 AED- this should be refunded in 21 days of payment however not refunded yet. 
*	Attachment 7 to email received from the party regarding Bid bond/ 2 step and payment for this tender.
*	Attachment 8 proof of payment for Bid bond / value 275,000 AED.
*	Attachment 9 entry permit provided by the client / Etihad aviation. 
*	Attachment 10 receipt of registration fees and bid bond / total of 329,820 AED.

 

Kindly note that we are still communicating with the contact person / EDWARD FABIEN/ And keeping him engaged. Moreover we didnâ€™t chase him yet for the refund till now as we do not want to make him alert and lose the contact. 

 

Need your expertise to action the next steps and take it up to with the relevant authorities.

 

Let me know if you need further details.

Best regards,
